body: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 5.4%. Year to date, Apple registers a 10.4% gain. And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading down 0.9%. Wal-Mart Stores is lower by about 4.3% looking at the year to date performance. Two other components making moves today are Microsoft ( MSFT ), trading down 0.7%, and JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading up 1.3% on the day.
title: Dow Movers: WMT, AAPL
